<<<<<<< HEAD
Infant-baptism from heaven, and not of men, or, A moderate discourse concerning the baptism of the infant-seed of believers whereunto is prefixed, a large introductory preface, preparing the readers way to a more profitable perusal of the ensuing treatise / by Joseph Whiston. Whiston, Joseph, d. 1690.
[46], 319 [i.e. 299] p.
Printed for Henry Million ..., London : 1670.
Error in paging: p. 157-176 omitted in numbering only. Errata: p. [44]. Imperfect: faded and stained, with considerable print show-through and loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======

Printed for Henry Million ..., London : 1670.
Error in paging: p. 157-176 omitted in numbering only. Errata: p. [44]. Imperfect: faded and stained, with considerable print show-through and loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
